name: Real Pinball HD - Wild-Games
description:
REAL PINBALL TABLES SALE! SAVE 50% FOR A LITMITED TIME!

The next table of REAL PINBALL is X-Games table where the players have to accomplish 5 different game and other modes on such extreme ways as activating of combos or jackpots. Of course the new pinball table also has the well-known features, like REWIND and SLOW-MOTION. As well as it has 2 difficulty level, ARCADE and SIMULATION.

- 2 DIFFICULTY LEVELS (ARCADE, SIMULATION)
- REVOLUTIONARY 3D GRAPHICS
- MOST REALISTIC BALL PHYSICS
- NEW GAMEPLAY FEATURES (REWIND, SLOW-MOTION)
- 6 DIFFERENT CAMERA VIEWS
- VARIABLE BALL SIZE
- OPENFEINT AND GAME CENTER SUPPORT
- DEFFERED LIGHTNING ON IPAD 2
- HIGHLY DETAILED SHADOWS ON IPAD 2
- DIRT EFFECT ON THE PLAYFIELD ON IPAD 2
